rows.translation: In the name of Allah, most benevolent, ever-merciful.
WHEN THE WORLD is shaken up by its cataclysm,
And the earth throws out its burdens,
And man enquires: "What has come over it?"
That day it will narrate its annals,
For your Lord will have commanded it.

rows.arabic: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ ٱلنَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا۟ أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ
rows.translation: That day people will proceed separately to be shown their deeds.
rows.transliteration: yawma-idhiy yaṣdurun nāsu ashtātal liyuraw a`mālahum

rows.arabic: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: Whosoever has done even an atom's weight of good will behold it;
rows.transliteration: faman ya`mal mithqāla dharratin khayran yarah

rows.arabic: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُۥ
rows.translation: And whosoever has done even an atom's weight of evil will behold that.
rows.transliteration: wa man ya`mal mithqāla dharratin sharran yarah
